personal.name: Alex Johnson
personal.summary: Senior Software Engineer with 7+ years of experience building scalable backend systems and cloud-native applications. Passionate about distributed systems, API design, and developer experience. Led teams of 3-5 engineers and delivered high-impact projects at growth-stage startups.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Lead backend engineer for the core platform team, responsible for API infrastructure and developer experience.
achievements: Designed and implemented a new microservices architecture that reduced API latency by 40% and improved system reliability to 99.95% uptime
Led migration from monolith to microservices, enabling team to ship features 3x faster
Built real-time event processing pipeline handling 10M+ events/day using Kafka and Go
Mentored 3 junior engineers, conducting weekly 1:1s and code reviews
Established API design standards and documentation practices adopted company-wide

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Full-stack engineer on the payments team, building features for B2B payment processing platform.
achievements: Built payment reconciliation system processing $50M+ monthly transactions with 99.99% accuracy
Developed internal admin dashboard using React and GraphQL, reducing support ticket resolution time by 60%
Implemented PCI-compliant data handling procedures and passed annual security audits
Optimized database queries reducing average response time from 500ms to 50ms

experience.title: Junior Software Engineer
experience.description: Backend developer on the data platform team.
achievements: Developed ETL pipelines processing 1TB+ data daily using Python and Apache Airflow
Built REST APIs for internal data services serving 100+ internal applications
Contributed to open-source data validation library with 500+ GitHub stars

projects.name: OpenAPI Generator Plugin
projects.description: Open-source plugin for generating type-safe API clients from OpenAPI specifications
highlights: Published as pip package with 10K+ monthly downloads

projects.name: Home Lab Kubernetes Cluster
projects.description: Self-hosted Kubernetes cluster for learning and running personal services
highlights: Runs 20+ services including monitoring, CI/CD, and personal applications
Documented setup process in a blog series with 10K+ views
